data.text: @ppgardne All experiments need good negative controls and in this case it seems it is you !
@char_kiwi Indeed. We've only left the property for socially distanced dog walking, and to collect the above RAT tests.
@gfkBill @ExcessiveSodiu1 Small audience -- dodgy, anonymous account. Seems like a time waster.
@ppgardne @ExcessiveSodiu1 Good call. I only feed them to educate others 😎

@ppgardne If you feel sick, stay home. That’s it. Stay home. It’s not rocket science, and there is no point being the pencil sharpener on any of it. Just Stay Home. Please, for the love of dogs, be a flicking real kiwi & help a nation out!
@ppgardne Tobias. Did you ever read Animorphs per chance? Hope they feel better soon
@ppgardne Well the older two are certainly constant company. When I went + it made things easier logistically
@MurrayCadzow I bet that must make you popular!  I hope the symptoms aren't bad.
